  • Class
    Description
    HTTPServer
    The HTTPServer interface defines methods for managing servlets and handling HTTP requests.
    MyHTTPServer
    The MyHTTPServer class extends the Thread class and implements the HTTPServer interface.
    RequestParser
    The RequestParser class provides functionality to parse HTTP requests from a BufferedReader.
    RequestParser.RequestInfo
    The RequestInfo class encapsulates information about an HTTP request.
